meanings.definition: A type of virus that causes respiratory illness in humans and animals.
meanings.sent1: The coronavirus spread quickly through the community.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the coronavirus to find a cure.
meanings.sent3: The coronavirus decided to take a vacation and left everyone feeling healthy.
meanings.sent4: The coronavirus was a silent intruder, creeping into unsuspecting cells.
meanings.sent5: The coronavirus was like a tiny ninja, attacking the body's defenses.

meanings.definition: The virus responsible for the COVID-19 pandemic.
meanings.sent1: Many people around the world have been affected by the coronavirus.
meanings.sent2: Health officials are working hard to contain the coronavirus outbreak.
meanings.sent3: The coronavirus threw a surprise party and invited everyone to stay home.
meanings.sent4: The coronavirus was a wake-up call for global health systems.
meanings.sent5: The coronavirus was a storm that changed the world's landscape.
